meaningMnemonic: This is when you take your <kanji>umbrella</kanji> and you <kanji>stand</kanji> it up. Wait, how is an umbrella standing up? Good question, my dear Crabling, you are putting your umbrella in an <vocabulary>umbrella stand</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: The reading is the readings for 傘 (learned with the kanji) and 立つ (to stand).
